title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Online Evidence-Based Education for Hepatitis B Prevention and Management

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Accurately identify and explain at least four transmission routes of Hepatitis B
List five essential test items for managing chronic Hepatitis B infections
Present safe injection practice guidelines in three or more sequential steps
Apply evidence-based prevention strategies to real-world clinical scenarios for explanation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
